Creo que la innovacion de el modo coperativo es genial y el modo de creacion de camaras, muaa perfecto.

The solo campaign is fine enough with its strong writing and voice acting, but it's the stellar co-op campaign that elevates Portal 2 into must-play territory. If you don't have any friends - I'm not saying you [i]should[/i] kidnap somebody and force them to play with you, but it's certainly an option.

Portal 2 may well be one of the most creative and smartest 3D puzzle platformers I have ever played.

Portal 2, though second in the series, lives up to the reputation of the original Portal, as well as completely exceeded my expectations. The story is great, the puzzles make you think, the humor is still fantastic, and it ultimately kept me engaged all throughout, making you think outside the box with some laughs along the way.

This is a MUST-HAVE game for anyone who loves puzzles. Hey, try it out even if you don't. There's a 95% chance you won't be asking for the refund.
Yes

(АЛЯРМ!!!! Спойлеры!)Portal 2 проходится за часов 10-15,но при этом все эти 10 часов будут наполнены геймплеем,смехом,сюжетными твистами,головоломками. Всю игру вы будете контактировать всего с двумя персонажами-ГЛаДОС и Уитли. Одну вы сначала будете ненавидеть, но после сдружитесь,другого вы будете считать другом,после предателем. Концовка заставила пустить скупую мужскую слезу(я держался,но это было выше моих сил). Погуглив перевод песни и узнав, что песню пела ГЛаДОС (в английской актёр озвучки ГЛаДОС исполнила песню конце),после этого в голове немного дополнился образ этой саркастичной садистки. Когда-то дядюшка Габен мог делать шедевры. Многие хотят продолжения Портала,как по мне концовка завершённая,а если и сделают...Прошу не делайте такую-же по атмосферы концовку,я не выдержу
Моему брату Артёму 15 лет а мне 10 лет. Мой брат не пресаединяется в Portal 2 подталкните моего брата?

Dieses Spiel ist so genial. Der Humor ist spitze und die Einführung von Koop und Workshop-Objekten ist eine toll Idee. Die Story, ist die beste, die ich je gespielt habe. Das ist mein absolutes Lieblingsspiel
比起绞尽脑汁用奇思妙想完成每一次传送过关的喜悦，本作探索光圈科技先驱者和二代光圈的故事更让人感到心灵震撼。庞大的地下工厂、自动化实验室、还有依旧陪伴在你身边的坏搭档Glados，带给人新奇又怀念的奇妙感觉。另外安利同人作品《portal：Mei》，剧情、场景、关卡、美术设计均是顶级水准，可以以此排遣等待那个男人出3之前的寂寞时光。
Ein sehr lustiges story rätsel spiel mit einem sehr guten Humor

When I originally reviewed Portal 2, I simply said "It's worth £7 all day long, mate!" but I think Portal 2 deserves more. It is a game that continues from the hectic ending of the first, after you reach the surfaces after your battle with GLaDOS. You awaken in a bed and are told to do basic aerobics. The voice in the sky then tells you to go back to bed, and as you do so, you awaken in a very similar room, with only one difference; time. In the rest of the game you frantically leap and teleport around the facilities testing tracks, meeting one eyed friends and others with more than one eye. I believe this is a complete must-have for any Steam user and it is a heartwarming and fun experience the whole world can enjoy.

That's the singleplayer. The multiplayer, however...

I put this game off for too long and only played it recently.

It is *excellent*.

The only reminder that you're not playing a modern game are the loading screens.
To put that in context I was surprised *every single time I saw one* because nothing else about the game makes you feel like you're playing something old enough to have loading screens between "levels".

If you haven't played it, and you are even vaguely curious about it, you would be doing yourself a favour to get it (and portal 1).

Secuela del aclamado Portal. En esta profundizaremos en tanto la historia de Aperture Science con sus personajes y la jugabilidad basada en portales. Demostrando por última vez hasta la fecha porque Valve es tan bueno a la hora de hacer diseño de niveles e impregnar carisma en sus pocos pero valorados títulos. La accesibilidad de sus niveles no implica simpleza ante todo aunque de todas maneras se hubiera valorado agregar niveles principales que requieran un poco más de dificultad. Aunque es un gran título tiende a ser algo conservador y no tratar de experimentar un cambio mecánicamente como lo hizo otra de sus franquicias: Half-Life 2. Fuera de este detalle y de momentos que si te lo pones a pensar puede desencajar con lo que esta sucediendo en el momento, es una entrega más que excelente y destacable hasta la fecha de hoy por todo lo mencionado. Es uno de los clásicos que al igual que su precuela debes jugarlo sí o sí para disfrutar una experiencia única.

This is my favorite video game of all time.

The story is amazing, and it goes perfectly with the puzzle aspect of the game. The story doesn't tell you a lot about anything so it leaves you pretty curious, just like the first game. I love this mysterious vibe and it makes the game so much more enjoyable for me. GladOS plays such a good role as a villain in Portal 1 & 2 and this game does everything it can to make GladOS an even better character. It also isn't one of those games that has a horrible ending but great story other than that, No. The entire story is great. 

The music also super good, makes every moment of the game seem like you are a character in some intense music. Really helps make the environment feel less bland.

The graphics and environment of your surroundings is really cool. I like the fallen apart look of all the puzzles, super cool. The way GladOS looks as well in this game, very very neat. 

This is a masterpiece of a game and I doubt it will happen, but I would love to see a portal 3, or some game that adds on to the Portal story line.
